BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 010159Z MAR
   BY M/V OCEANIC CHAMPION TOWING 12 FIVE MILE
   LONG CABLES IN AREA BOUND BY
   24-24.37S 040-22.47W, 23-19.97S 040-59.17W,
   23-11.27S 040-41.50W, 22-58.62S 040-48.30W,
   22-27.07S 039-42.35W, 23-44.03S 038-58.40W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 010259Z MAR 14.
